SENT.plain: Some of the most important types of nonfamilial tall stature are discussed by stressing the clinical features, diagnostic aspects and therapeutic possibilities
The indications of treatment, the diagnostic procedures and steroid therapy of the familial type of tall stature, the predominant variant of tall stature, are presented in detail
The effects, side effects and contraindications of high dose steroid treatment are described
The important prerequisite for the evaluation of psychosomatic problems of tall stature is the understanding of the dynamics and variations of normal growth
This and the knowledge of methods concerning growth analyses continue to be the basis of an accurate diagnosis
